name: authentication-complete
description: Complete authentication system with email/password and Google OAuth
changes: Implemented full authentication flow (sign up, sign in, sign out)
Created SignIn.tsx and SignUp.tsx pages with black background design
Added password strength validation and visual indicators
Implemented mock Google OAuth for development
Created password hashing utilities with bcrypt
Updated database schema to support password authentication
Added JWT token management for session handling
Fixed navigation from landing page to auth pages
Added support for both email/password and Google authentication
Fixed formatting issues with logo positioning
notes: Authentication system is fully functional on localhost. Google OAuth uses mock implementation for development. See docs/google-oauth-localhost-setup.md for production setup instructions.
